ygData.subject: RE: Charm after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The punching magical mobs made it in.  I was gleefully hitting undead ghoul frogloks for up to 9 points damage last night in between charms.  :) I think
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 29 Oct 1999, David Knadler wrote:
>
> You know... this is odd. Did any of the bard related patches actually make
> it into the game!?! I received no "charm broken" messages last night as
> well (although, I should point out that I only used charm 2 or 3 times
> during heavy combat - it's possible that I missed it).

The punching magical mobs made it in. I was gleefully hitting
undead ghoul frogloks for up to 9 points damage last night in
between charms. :)

I think that's why they made our instruments magical. They
could make our punches magical via magical gloves, but having
a non-magical instrument equipped overrode that. So I think
they fixed it by just making all our instruments magical, then
made a big deal about it in the patch message.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
